title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: I am unable to assign a command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination. The keybinding manager incorrectly identifies it as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word instead. When trying to reassign the key via the key preference page, pressing Ctrl+Backspace displays Ctrl+Del. I am using a Swiss German keyboard with the Swiss German locale.
OB: The keybinding manager thinks Ctrl+Backspace is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.
EB: Ctrl+Backspace should be recognized as a separate key combination and allow the assignment of commands.
SR: To reproduce the issue, use a Swiss German keyboard with the Swiss German locale and try to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace using the key preference page. Pressing Ctrl+Backspace should display Ctrl+Del, preventing the assignment of commands.
